TextLibrary.Text: Alright, scumbags, this is the last thing I want. Out in the Circinus System, the Vortraag have a temple to some ugly-looking Lizard God. You go there and bring me back one of the whips their priests use, and your friend goes free.

Alright, scumbags, this is the last thing I want. Out in the Circinus System, the Vortraag have a temple to some ugly-looking Lizard God. You go there and bring me back one of the whips their priests use, and your friend goes free.
